text: The Wizard of the Strings is a 1985 American short documentary film about Roy Smeck, directed by Peter Friedman. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==Cast== * Roy Smeck as himself ==References== ==External links== *The Wizard of the Strings at Strange Attractions *The Wizard of the Strings at Cinema Guild * Category:1985 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:American independent films Category:Documentary films about music and musicians Category:1985 documentary films Category:1985 independent films
title: The Wizard of the Strings
